commander.name: Major General Jonathan W. Anderson
commander.previous_service: WWI veteran, Regular Army. Led division through Operation Torch and Tunisia Campaign.

M2A1 105mm Howitzer.notes: Three battalions, 12 guns each (9th, 10th, 39th FA Bn)

M3 37mm AT Gun.notes: Regimental AT companies - inadequate vs German armor

supply_logistics.supply_status: Adequate but strained - Tunisia Campaign logistics challenges. Supply lines from Algerian ports (Oran) stretched 500+ km to Tunisia. Fuel adequate for defensive operations, limited for offensive. Ammunition resupply slower than 8th Army. Water adequate from local wells. Learning desert logistics.

weather_environment.terrain_type: Tunisian highlands - mountainous terrain, rocky passes, wadis, scattered olive groves. Eastern Dorsal mountains.
